mapper.select: select `from`,`to`,`trans_result_src`,`trans_result_dst` from translate_info_cache as ci where delete = '0' and hahs = ${hash}
mapper.update: INSERT INTO table_name (`hash`, `from`, `to`, `trans_result_src`,`trans_result_dst`) VALUES (${hash}, ${from}, ${to}, ${trans_result_src}, ${trans_result_dst}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE hahs = ${hash}
mapper.select: select `name`,`code`,`tag`,`sort`,`from_hot` AS fromHot, `to_hot` AS toHot from translate_lan
UPDATE translate_lan SET from_hot = from_hot + CASE WHEN code = ${fromCode} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, to_hot = to_hot + CASE WHEN code = ${toCode} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END WHERE code IN (${fromCode}, ${toCode});
